00027 #include "lbann/lbann_params.hpp"
00028 
00029 using namespace std;
00030 using namespace El;
00031 
00032 lbann::TrainingParams::TrainingParams(void)
00033   : EnableProfiling(false), RandomSeed(1), ShuffleTrainingData(1),
00034     PercentageTrainingSamples(1.00), PercentageValidationSamples(1.00),
00035     PercentageTestingSamples(1.00), TestWithTrainData(0),
00036     EpochCount(2), MBSize(192),
00037     LearnRate(0.3), LearnRateMethod(2),
00038     LrDecayRate(0.5), LrDecayCycles(5000),
00039     ActivationType(activation_type::SIGMOID), DropOut(-1), Lambda(0),
00040     DatasetRootDir("."), SaveImageDir("."), ParameterDir("."),
00041     SaveModel(false), LoadModel(false), Checkpoint(10), TrainFile(" "),
00042     TestFile(" "), SummaryDir("."), IntermodelCommMethod(0), ProcsPerModel(0) {
00043 }
00044 
00045 void lbann::TrainingParams::parse_params(void) {
00046 
00047   EnableProfiling = Input("--profiling", "Enable profiling", EnableProfiling);
00048 
00049   RandomSeed = Input("--seed", "Random seed", RandomSeed);
00050   ShuffleTrainingData = Input("--random-training-samples", "0 - Pick first N training samples, 1 - Select N random training samples", ShuffleTrainingData);
00051 
00052   PercentageTrainingSamples = Input("--percentage-training-samples", "Percentage of training set sampled during training [0.00 to 1.00]", PercentageTrainingSamples);
00053   PercentageValidationSamples = Input("--percentage-validation-samples", "Percentage of the unused training set sampled during validation [0.00 to 1.00]", PercentageValidationSamples);
00054   PercentageTestingSamples = Input("--percentage-testing-samples", "Percentage of testing set sampled during testing", PercentageTestingSamples);
00055   TestWithTrainData = Input("--test-with-train-data", "Use the training data for validation", TestWithTrainData);
00056 
00057   EpochCount = Input("--num-epochs", "# of training epochs", EpochCount);
00058   MBSize = Input("--mb-size", "Size of the mini-batch to be trained", MBSize);
00059 
00060   LearnRate = Input("--learning-rate", "How much of the gradient update is applied to the weight matrix", LearnRate);
00061   LearnRateMethod = Input("--learning-rate-method", "1 - Adagrad, 2 - RMSprop", LearnRateMethod);
00062   LrDecayRate = Input("--lr-decay-rate", "How much does the learning rate decay when it decays", LrDecayRate);
00063   LrDecayCycles = Input("--lr-decay-cycle", "How often does the learning rate decay", LrDecayCycles);
00064   ActivationType = static_cast<activation_type>(Input("--activation-type", "1 - Sigmoid, 2 - Tanh, 3 - reLU, 4 - id", static_cast<int>(ActivationType)));
00065   DropOut = Input("--drop-out", "% dropout", DropOut);
00066   Lambda = Input("--lambda", "Lambda for L2 Regularization", Lambda);
00067 
00068   DatasetRootDir = Input("--dataset", "Location of train and test data", DatasetRootDir);
00069   TrainFile = Input("--train-file", "Train data file",TrainFile);
00070   TestFile = Input("--test-file", "Test data file", TestFile);
00071 
00072   SaveImageDir = Input("--output", "Location to save output images", SaveImageDir);
00073   ParameterDir = Input("--params", "Location to save model parameters", ParameterDir);
00074   SaveModel = Input("--save-model", "Save the current model", SaveModel);
00075   LoadModel = Input("--load-model", "Load a saved model", LoadModel);
00076   Checkpoint = Input("--checkpoint", "Number of training epochs between checkpoints", Checkpoint);
00077   SummaryDir = Input("--summary-dir", "Directory to write summary files", SummaryDir);
00078 
00079   IntermodelCommMethod = Input("--imcomm", "Type of inter-model communication",
00080                                IntermodelCommMethod);
00081   ProcsPerModel = Input("--procs-per-model",
00082                         "Number of processes per model (0 = one model)",
00083                         ProcsPerModel);
00084 }

00086 lbann::PerformanceParams::PerformanceParams(void) : BlockSize(256), MaxParIOSize(0) {}
00087 
00088 void lbann::PerformanceParams::parse_params(void) {
00089   BlockSize = Input("--block-size", "libElemental Block Size", BlockSize);
00090   MaxParIOSize = Input("--par-IO", "Maximum parallel I/O size (0 - unlimited)", MaxParIOSize);
00091 }
00092 
00093 lbann::NetworkParams::NetworkParams(void) : NetworkStr("1000") {
00094   parse_network_string();
00095 }
00096 
00097 void lbann::NetworkParams::parse_params(void) {
00098   NetworkStr = Input("--network", "Specify the hidden layers of the topology", NetworkStr);
00099   parse_network_string();
00100 }
00101 
00102 void lbann::NetworkParams::parse_network_string(void) {
00103   Network.clear();
00104   const std::string delim = ",";
00105   size_t start = 0U;
00106   size_t end = NetworkStr.find(delim);
00107   while(end != std::string::npos) {
00108     Network.push_back(std::stoi(NetworkStr.substr(start, end - start), nullptr, 0));
00109     start = end + delim.length();
00110     end = NetworkStr.find(delim, start);
00111   }
00112   Network.push_back(std::stoi(NetworkStr.substr(start, end), nullptr, 0));
00113 }
00114 
00115 lbann::SystemParams::SystemParams(void)
00116   : HostName("Unknwn"), NumNodes(-1), NumCores(-1), TasksPerNode(-1) {}
00117 
00118 void lbann::SystemParams::parse_params(void) {
00119   HostName = Input("--hostname", "HPC hostname", HostName);
00120   NumNodes = Input("--num-nodes", "Total allocation size", NumNodes);
00121   NumCores = Input("--num-cores", "Number of cores per node", NumCores);
00122   TasksPerNode = Input("--tasks-per-node", "MPI Tasks allowed per node", TasksPerNode);
00123 }
